articles.description: Zens has debuted its new Liberty Built-in wireless charger, which improves on the original by offering a design that allows it to be directly integrated into your desk — assuming you have the necessary woodworking skills.

Zens new Liberty Built-in wireless charger makes the striking multi-coil charger even more streamlined
Image: Zens
Zens is expanding its excellent alternative to Apples failed AirPower charger, the… [+2488 chars]
